item.title: @elonmusk: I mean, the "mom" - who had apparently lost custody of 2/3 of her kids due to neglect or abuse - got...
item.description: I mean, the "mom" - who had apparently lost custody of 2/3 of her kids due to neglect or abuse - got shot because she was illegally impeding an active arrest, tried to flee the scene, and drove her SUV at a federal agent as part of that. The agent briefly went to the hospital with internal bleeding. The "nurse" got shot because he was "directing traffic" around an active ICE situation, moved over to illegally interfere with it, and grabbed and scuffled with agents - all while armed and with two spare magazines on him. Both of these people were apparently part of a large, illicit underground network that is apparently doing things like illegally recording license plates and addresses and connected with ICE - and flat out dispatching raiders to screw with government arrests. You can view these two shoots as good or not, but the state is not killing people for being "too good, too noble." These were VERY predictable, avoidable situations of violence.

item.title: @elonmusk: 36,500 killed in two days? They're massacring their own civilians. Where are the protesters in the w...
item.description: 36,500 killed in two days? They're massacring their own civilians. Where are the protesters in the west -- the university encampments, the street protests, the UN, Hollywood?

item.title: @elonmusk: Question for Americans from a dumb Aussie about the Minnesota thing. Obama used ICE to deport approx...
item.description: Question for Americans from a dumb Aussie about the Minnesota thing. Obama used ICE to deport approx 3M illegals, and got the nickname "Deporter in Chief". And he wasn't even voted in on doing that. There were some protests, but nothing even remotely violet or crazy. Why is now everyone so violet and crazy? Is there any other explanation apart from Orange Man Bad?

item.title: @elonmusk: Enrique Bautista Vasquez is a 20-year-old illegal accused of sexually assaulting a 14-year-old autis...
item.description: Enrique Bautista Vasquez is a 20-year-old illegal accused of sexually assaulting a 14-year-old autistic girl. He allegedly lured her to his Cathedral City apartment on New Year's Eve. Julio Cesar Xocop-Vicente, a criminal illegal alien from Guatemala, killed Amber Paris, a 15-year-old girl and American citizen, after running a stop sign while speeding and striking her with his vehicle. He fled the scene and was arrested the next day, but was released by local authorities, allowing him to walk free on bond before ICE could file an immigration detainer. Worse, local authorities then dismissed his driving-without-a-license charge on December 2, 2025, while Paris was still fighting for her life. This isn't the first time he has been arrested and set free under sanctuary policies. This is who the Democrats are protecting. Who you vote for matters.

item.title: @elonmusk: A man was walking his dog in Washington. Some lunatic walked up to him and asked what religion he wa...
item.description: A man was walking his dog in Washington. Some lunatic walked up to him and asked what religion he was. He said Christian and the lunatic stabbed him & his dog who are now both in the hospital. The suspect was kiIIed by police violently resisting arrest.
